signUp.step1: We're excited to have you join! Lets start with getting some basic information for your profile.
signUp.step2: Almost done! Next, fill out your email and password then get ready to start posting.
signUp.name: Profile Name
signUp.handleHelp: This is a quick way to tag others and shows one your profile like '@myhandle2000'

error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long

home.heroSubtitle: A place run by cats, for cats. Upload and share your picture with other and make new friends.
home.description1: At catspace, we believe every cat deserves a spotlight! Our platform is dedicated to feline enthusiasts, where you can showcase your beloved companions, share adorable moments, and connect with other cat lovers.
home.description2: Whether you're looking for tips, cat facts, or just a friendly community, we have it all. Join us to celebrate the purrfect world of cats and forge friendships that transcend borders, all while enjoying a playful atmosphere that's truly designed for our furry friends.

footer.copyright: Designed and built by Megan Krenbrink.

profile.placeholder: Hello! I'm {{name}}, the fluffiest boss around. I spend my days napping in sunbeams and pretending not to care about your attention... but don't be fooledâ€”I control everything. Pet me if you must, but only for 3 seconds, then I'll claw your hand. My real passion? Pushing your things off ledges just to see what happens. Feed me at exactly 6 p.m., or else...
